DOC.brief_summary: This study is to verify the efficacy of fluvoxamine maleate given for 10 weeks in treatment of children and adolescents with obsessive-compulsive disorder
DOC.brief_title: Fluvoxamine Maleate in the Treatment of Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder: A Post-marketing Clinical Study in Children and Adolescents
